body: SO, today I finally got got unbanned. Unfortunately not even FOUR HOURS after I joined the server I get banned again for aimbot. Are you serious? Im so DONE. Just saying this server needs to get better mods. Because every time I kill a mod it's like "OH MY GOD HE KILLED ME MUST BE A HACKER , BECAUSE IM THE BEST AT THIS GAME AND I CAN NEVER DIE".

title: Why does Avicus hate me...

Sorry to hear about this, please email support or appeal again.
